stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Pensacola, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Pensacola are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Pensacola is a military town with many active duty and retired military residents, all of whom benefit from Florida's strong consumer protections.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Pensacola must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

localReviews.headline: What Pensacola Customers Say About Lion Cash Advance

reviews.name: Captain Scott M.
reviews.text: Great service for military personnel. Fast approval and they understood military pay structures. Highly recommend to anyone stationed in Pensacola.

reviews.name: Nicole T.
reviews.text: Close to the beach and very convenient. Got my emergency cash same-day with no issues. Professional and friendly service.

reviews.name: Thomas K.
reviews.text: Good location near Davis Highway. Quick process and clear explanation of Florida's protections. Very satisfied.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Escambia County Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Pensacola location? We also serve these nearby communities:

faq.question: Where is your Pensacola cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Pensacola branch is located at 2891 North Davis Highway, Suite 170, near beautiful Pensacola Beach and the Naval Aviation Museum. We're easy to access from US-90.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Pensacola location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Walk-ins welcome!

faq.question: Do you serve active duty military?
faq.answer: Yes! We serve many active duty military personnel stationed at Naval Air Station Pensacola. We understand military pay structures and are familiar with military IDs and military bank accounts.

faq.question: Can I get a cash advance if I'm on military leave?
faq.answer: As long as you have a valid military ID and can verify your income, you can qualify. We're happy to serve military personnel who need emergency cash.

faq.question: What's the easiest way to apply?
faq.answer: You can apply online before visiting our location or just walk in. Either way, we'll have you approved and out with cash in 15-30 minutes.
